about_the_game:
Drift into the Music

Feel the beats and play with the rhythm of 15 neon/synthwave songs!
Collect BEATS during your performance and collect them at the end of the show!
Too many errors will cut it short it before the end!

Everything start with a note

Spend your BEATS to unlock awesome neon items in the shop!
Each item is connected to an achievement! Customize your Steam profile with those awesome objects!

What about WAIFUS?

Activate the Adult Content DLC (Need help?) to replace neon items in the shop with our special hostesses.
Purchase a picture in the Shop unlocks it in the Gallery. You can download unlocked pictures.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old

detailed_description:
Drift into the Music

Feel the beats and play with the rhythm of 15 neon/synthwave songs!
Collect BEATS during your performance and collect them at the end of the show!
Too many errors will cut it short it before the end!

Everything start with a note

Spend your BEATS to unlock awesome neon items in the shop!
Each item is connected to an achievement! Customize your Steam profile with those awesome objects!

What about WAIFUS?

Activate the Adult Content DLC (Need help?) to replace neon items in the shop with our special hostesses.
Purchase a picture in the Shop unlocks it in the Gallery. You can download unlocked pictures.

name: DJ Beats - Waifus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: -

short_description: DJ BEATS - WAIFUS is a rhythm game with stunning synthwave songs and dozens of items to unlock! Collect BEATS and spend them to unlock them for your profile!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
